findings.title: Possible inaccessible contract
findings.description: View function which iterates through the array of undefined size could be out-of-work in the case when there would be a huge amount of values inside the array.

findings.title: A public function that could be declared external
findings.description: Public functions that are never called by the contract should be declared external to save gas.
findings.function: issue, redeem, issueFromOtherToken, issueFromWrappedToken, redeemToOtherToken, redeemToWrappedToken, createPortToken, userPortTokens, deposit, withdraw
